name: Business HQ
overview:
BusinessHQ.com gives importers and e-commerce businesses dead-simple tools for managing their companies.

Its web-based software automatically syncs with your company’s online stores, pulling sales data and pushing inventory stats in near real-time.

The application also exchanges data seamlessly with Amazon Merchant and eBay Seller accounts, unifying sales data from across multiple channels both online and off.

The software then lets you export your data to a QuickBooks file so you can sync with your accountant.

The company’s core application is offered for free, however they offer paid upgrades for accounts with more users. BusinessHQ.com offers free data migrations to its secure platform for all customers signing up for a paid account.

The site’s soon to be released API will allow custom integration projects so your BusinessHQ account can share data with your current software.
